author: Robert Ross
comment: Absolute trash. Announcing Amazon music as third option... except on our most popular models.  One of the first two music options shut down permanently last year. Audi MMI is utter garbage with no first tier music options.  My brand new Audi has a worse system than an 8 year old Ford. Pathetic and inexcusable.

author: Graham Thomas
comment: Works fine in my 2017 S3 however the find my car doesn't always work be nice if the car picked up it's location from the GPS and sent it back or checked it's accuracy with the app after a few minutes. My car was showing parked 12 hours ago outside work when it's on my drive :-/ Amazon music meh! Why not add useful services like Google Play music deezer and Spotify. Come on Audi buck up your ideas. Too many flaws not enough updates.

author: Kerry Buchanan
comment: I don't understand the point of this app. It doesn't let you control locks, start/stop, etc. My phone notifies me about the power drain from the app (Samsung S8+) about once a day. My previous Chevy was much more advanced. It also doesn't save your parking location without connecting to the car wifi for some reason (rather than using the monthly Audi Connect service I pay for). This app seems to exist solely for the purpose of saying "there is an app.

author: Helen Corbett
comment: Sort this out.....The latest update stated that amazon music is now supported, so I linked my amazon music account to my 2017 S3 and after eventually getting it to work the car locator now always considers my parking location to be my start location and NOT my finishing location if Amazon music is running, what damn use us that?  If I don't run Amazon music through the MMI the car locator works fine, this is an error that needs fixing by the developers.  As I now have one function working or the other but not both!!!  Agree with other reviewers that the functionality is not exactly state if the art for the price we're paying for the cars and options!

author: David Burns
comment: Crashes when doing just about anything, such as adding a destination or viewing contacts. Shame on Audi. It looks like they spent less building this app than I did on my accessories. Thinks I've been parked at the same place for weeks. No ability to control any car feature or see fuel levels on my brand new S4. Audi would be better withdrawing the App than falsely claiming it can do anything. At all.

author: Chinmay Jade
comment: The car locator function does not store my parking location automatically as it should for my 2017 S3. Also, share location from other apps also doesn't work. The car is always disconnected in the settings page. I have set it up all correctly and my Audi dealership is also not able to figured out what's wrong. Not expected from Audi. :(

author: Dušan Stanković
comment: Useless. Buggy and disappointing that Audi  cannot even begin to match the apps of any US manufacturer in terms of functionality. Cannot lock / unlock, locator barely works, if ever, and the app often fails to connect and even start. Disappointing.

author: Adam Saunders
comment: Does anybody else get the error message saying there is a server error? One of the main reasons was to connect my smart phone to the in car screen but haven't been able to do so..... really really dissatisfied Audi!!

author: Scott Watson
comment: False reporting, crashing and limited use. Could be so much better and form the basis for upcoming remote interactions, but not as it sits now.

author: Adam M
comment: Absolutely garbage. Keeps constantly crashing on phone. Shame big company such as Audi can't deliver decent app on 21 century.

author: Neil McCloy
comment: Terrible, connects to care then says it is not connected. Can't connect for any music. Another awful unusable app from Audi. Will have to stick to Bluetooth for music

author: dave williams
comment: My weekday commute by car is 20 mins each way and I do not always use this app. However it com sides 22% of my battery. Inefficient.

author: Rich Walchuck
comment: VW car-net is a better app. Painful to send destinations to the car. No lock/unlock for A3

author: paul l
comment: Forced to download this as my etron app said it went away.  Now i can't connect to my car!  What trash!
Disappointing application. Always server error, no connection with the car. Sad...
Waste of time trying to install this app. Cumbersome. Use your time elsewhere.

author: Peter Bell
comment: Latest version is a severe battery drain on Android 8.1.0.  Nexus 6P. Drained my battery in 4h !
Trash application, audi should be embarrassed by their developers

author: morten reimers
comment: Garbage! Only works maybe 5% of the time.

author: Andrzej Nosek
comment: It's a shame for Audi. This app is a joke. Audi disConnect...

author: Chris Rodriguez
comment: Drains phone battery. Tried two phones and the same thing happens. Sometimes have to restart to get to use lock and unlock on my Q7.

author: Paul de Blok
comment: Doesn't work most of the times you actually want to use it. Audi should do much better with this...

author: James Wells
comment: Great app love the use especially when the car can be  checked. Would love it to work with a samsung smartwatch which has tizen. Would be great with the NFC features coming.

author: laurent vanderbrugge
comment: Rubbish. Way behind Bmw connected!

author: Chris Moseley
comment: This is beyond poor. Awful onboarding, awful to use, poorly thought out. Would buy an Audi because of this.

author: Gavin Kingsley
comment: Connection can sometimes be an issue, and I have no control of the heater in my A4.

author: Alexander Milosevic
comment: Can we please get more features in Canada on this app right now on my car i can only lock and unlock.

author: Hans Stålhandske
comment: It's way to slow, are the servers from 1990?!

author: Brian
comment: It's, ok. Need to add finger print to lock/unlock. Add sesames, swipe/tap hold to quick lock

author: Michael Gasiecki
comment: This is a very useful app but it's lack of features for the A6 is disappointing, many useful features though.

author: Ross Martin
comment: Total rubbish in 2017

author: Kevin Best
comment: Too much battery usage
Unreliable therefore useless

author: Piotr Baczyk
comment: Eventually works on android 8.0

author: Ovidiu-Mihai Mănăstireanu
comment: Useless
Trash

author: Tony Machado
comment: Very good

author: Andrew Baggaley
comment: Pretty much pointless app. I mean who uses Napstar as a music app on your phone. I did t even know it still existed until I downloaded this app. It's just makes Audi look like it's out of touch with mobile and computer technology beyond the car.

author: Daniel Banu
comment: This app is so limiting and archaic. Can't use other apps on my phone... Doesn't play whatsapp messages... Hard to navigate in it and also gets stuck a lot. DEFINITELY NOT WHAT I EXPECTED FROM AUDI

author: Tyler Wickstrom
comment: Works fine for the features I care about  (car locator and destination lookup). Internet radio function seems like an after thought with no real worthwhile content. App is kind of clunky and not sleek looking. Plenty of room for improvement, it is not on the same level as the virtual cockpit inside the car.
